people.name: Qin Shi Huang
people.description: Qin Shi Huang  or Qin Shi Huangdi, meaning the First Emperor of Qin, was the founder of the Qin dynasty and the first emperor of China.

people.name: Mao Yichang
people.description: Mao Yichang  was a Chinese farmer and grain merchant who achieved notability as the father of revolutionary political theorist Mao Zedong.

people.name: Adam Smith
people.description: Adam Smith FRSA  was a Scottish moral philosopher, pioneer of political economy, and a key figure in the Scottish Enlightenment.

people.name: Jia Yongsheng
people.description: Jia Yongsheng  is a retired lieutenant general  of the People's Liberation Army Air Force  of China.

people.name: Huang Hengmei

buildings.name: House of Mao Zedong
buildings.description: The Qing dynasty , officially the Great Qing , also called the Empire of the Great Qing or the Manchu dynasty, was the last imperial dynasty of China, ruling from 1644 to 1912 with a brief, abortive restoration in 1917

cities.name: Qing dynasty
cities.description: The Qing dynasty , officially the Great Qing , also called the Empire of the Great Qing or the Manchu dynasty, was the last imperial dynasty of China, ruling from 1644 to 1912 with a brief, abortive restoration in 1917.

cities.name: Tongzhou District, Beijing
cities.description: Tongzhou District  is a district of Beijing.  It is located in southeast Beijing and considered the eastern gateway to the nation's capital.

cities.name: Shanghai Municipality
cities.description: Shanghai , often abbreviated as Hu  or Shen , is the second of the most populous city in China and the most populous city proper in the world.

cities.name: the People's Republic of China
cities.description: China, officially the People's Republic of China , is a sovereign state in East Asia.
